name: Jimbo is Alone
description:
Jimbo All Alone was made over a period of 48 hours for McGameJam 2023 by a team of four students.

Play as Jimbo, a penguin who has been deserted by his family. Survive the Arctic wilderness and help Jimbo reunite with them!

Credits-

Benjamin Skoczylas- Art

Helena Clifford- Art and Music

Jonah Fairweather- Programming

Sarvasv Arora- Programming

Additional sounds from https://freesound.org/
